cause.description:
In addition to maintaining the Global Network Peace X Peace has a variety of programs designed to empower women as peacebuilders and to promote sustainable peace. Programs include: Circles in Action: Where members around the globe mentor and inform each other, build, promote and share a wide range of Circle-led peacebuilding projects.
Turning the Tables: Education and advocacy projects that mobilize member support for women’s equal participation in the prevention, management, and resolution of conflicts.
This Week’s Peace Action: Where members around the globe take weekly coordinated actions for peace at the individual, family, community, national, and international level.
Learn more about how to participate at www.peacexpeace.org.
1. Combining the power of women connecting with the Internet multiplies the affect and actions of peacebuilders more effectively than any other medium.
2. Women play a significant role in building sustainable peace, but are under-represented at all levels of political participation.
3. The Peace X Peace Global Network, a secure social networking platform, connects women from around the corner or around the world in Circles.
4. Join our cause, and join our global community of peacebuilders at www.peacexpeace.org.
cause.mission: Peace X Peace is the women-led NGO that multiplies the power of women by the power of leading-edge communication technology to promote solidarity, lift up women’s voices, and build sustainable peace.
cause.name: Peace X Peace
